Sentencas: Cobalt and strontium-free Ruddelesden-Popper (RP) perovskite oxides are excellent air electrodes for reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs).
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In this work, a novel Pr1.8Ba0.2Ni1-xFexO4 (denoted as PBNFx; x = 0, 0.05, 0.1, 0.15)
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: RP perovskite air electrode is studied to evaluate its potential application in RSOCs.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 can promote surface oxygen exchange and ionic diffusion, thus reducing the polarization resistance (Rp) of the PBN electrode.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The PBNF0.1 half-cell shows a low Rp value of 0.044 omega cm2 and good stability when operated in RSOC mode.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The PBNF0.1 electrode exhibits excellent electrochemical performance and the highest oxygen vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In fuel cell mode, PBNF0.1 single cell reaches the maximum power density of 645 mW cm- 2, which is approximately 15 % higher than PBN (545 mW cm-2) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In electrolysis mode and at 1.3 V with 70 %H2O at 800 degrees C, the PBNF0.1 single cell also exhibits a high electrolysis current density of 0.9 A cm-2, which has improved by approximately 25 % of that of the PBN.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the PBNF0.1 single cell achieves the current density of 665 mA cm-2 at 1.4 V with 50 %CO2 at 800 degrees C. Results demonstrate that PBNF0.1 is a po-tential air electrode for RSOCs.
Titulo: Evaluation of Fe-doped Pr1.8Ba0.2NiO4 as a high-performance air electrode for reversible solid oxide cell
